title: S4 Ep24: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 12 – Turning Point
itunes:title: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 12 – Turning Point
description:
December 5, 2019 / In this season's final addendum, Rebecca discusses the final episode with the Undisclosed team as well as next steps in the Greg Lance case.
 
Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
 
Today’s addendum has been sponsored by Parcast, Perfect Snacks and Embr.
 
Listen and subscribe to NATURAL DISASTERS for free on Spotify or anywhere you listen to podcasts.
